TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CCParallaxNode extends CocosSharp.CCNode

summary.para: : A node that simulates a parallax scroller.

Docs.param: Z order for drawing priority. Please refer to setZOrder(int)
A interger to identify the node easily. Please refer to setTag(int)
Docs.summary: Adds a child to the container with z order and tag

remarks.para: Adds a child to the container with z order and tag
If the child is added to a 'running' node, then 'onEnter' and 'onEnterTransitionDidFinish' will be called immediately.

Docs.param: The child node which will be removed.
true if all running actions and callbacks on the child node will be cleanup, false otherwise.
Docs.summary: Removes a child from the container. It will also cleanup all running actions depending on the cleanup parameter.

remarks.para: Removes a child from the container. It will also cleanup all running actions depending on the cleanup parameter.

Docs.summary: Visits this node's children and draw them recursively.
